attributes.action: TELL US WHY YOU FEEL you can call Boko Haram 'evil' while you, at the same time, are using UK Foreign Aid to bolster regimes who fund terrorism.
attributes.additional_details: The International Forum recently produced evidence that money sent to corrupt foreign governments on your personal instruction is being funnelled to islamic terrorist organisations like Boko Haram.  You continue to fund them, despite this evidence.   This confirms just how thoroughly dishonest an individual you are.
